mapper.select: select t1.id,t1.name from sys_role t1 left join sys_user_role_mid t2 on t1.id = t2.role_id left join sys_user t3 on t2.user_id = t3.id and t3.valid=true where t3.name = #{username} and t1.valid=true

select t1.id,t1.name,t3.id t3_id,t3.pattern t3_pattern,t3.note t3_note,t3.space_id as t3_space_id from sys_role t1 left join sys_role_perm_mid t2 on t1.id = t2.role_id left join sys_perm t3 on t2.perm_id = t3.id left join sys_user_role_mid t4 on t4.role_id = t1.id left join sys_user t5 on t4.user_id = t5.id and t5.valid=true where t5.name = #{username} and t1.valid=true
